criteria: All foundational backend APIs (Auth, Users, Data) are deployed and pass integration tests. Core calculator UI is functional and responsive.
success_metrics: Zero critical bugs in core calculator. All backend endpoints are secured.

criteria: User registration and login flows are functional and secure (PKCE flow validated). Basic offline functionality does not introduce data inconsistencies.
success_metrics: No vulnerabilities found in the authentication flow.

criteria: Secure formula execution Lambda passes all security reviews and penetration tests. Custom mode creation wizard is free of input validation vulnerabilities.
tools_used: Manual Code Review, AWS IAM Policy Simulator

criteria: Offline data synchronization feature is robust and passes all E2E test scenarios for data loss and conflict resolution.
bypass_criteria: Not applicable for data integrity feature.
success_metrics: Zero instances of data loss or corruption in automated test suite (RISK-001).
